refnamediv.refpurpose: Check if code point is a control character

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public static boolnullIntlChar::iscntrl intstringcodepoint
Determines whether the specified code point is a control character.
A control character is one of the following:
ISO 8-bit control character (U+0000..U+001f and U+007f..U+009f) IntlChar::CHAR_CATEGORY_CONTROL_CHAR (Cc) IntlChar::CHAR_CATEGORY_FORMAT_CHAR (Cf) IntlChar::CHAR_CATEGORY_LINE_SEPARATOR (Zl) IntlChar::CHAR_CATEGORY_PARAGRAPH_SEPARATOR (Zp)
